import React from 'react'; import { useCart } from './CartContext.tsx'; const Cart: React.FC = () => { const { cart, removeFromCart } = useCart(); return (

Shopping Cart

{cart.map((item) => (
{item.name}

{item.description}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

${item.price}
))}
Subtotal

Shipping taxes, and discounts calculated at checkout

); }; export default Cart;
